maurovanetti_twodotfived.name: 2•5D
maurovanetti_twodotfived.description: 2.5D perspective, setting the Z elevation based on the object's vertical position on screen.

locked.name: Locked
locked.desc: If the vertical position of the object on the screen cannot change, it can be locked so that its Z elevation can be computed only once (a small performance benefit).

image-point.name: Image point
image-point.desc: ID or name of the image point to use as a reference for the 2.5D perspective.

delta-z.name: Max Z variation
delta-z.desc: Object at the screen's bottom will get this Z elevation, objects in the middle will get 0, and objects at the top will get this value but negative.

set-locked.description: When locked, the Z elevation for this object instance is not updated anymore.

enabled.name: Locked
enabled.desc: Locked: Z elevation is constant. Unlocked: Z elevation is updated every tick depending on its Y position on the screen.
